verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In an extremely unusual diplomatic meeting] , [ARG1: US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo] [V: sat] down [ARGM-PRP: for a three - course meal with Kim Yong Chol , a confidant of North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] . They are working to resurrect a summit between President Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un in Singapore .

In an extremely unusual diplomatic meeting , US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo sat down for a three - course meal with Kim Yong Chol , a confidant of North Korean leader Kim Jong Un . They [V: are] working to resurrect a summit between President Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un in Singapore .
